epic.sir

Class IndividualAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • epic.sir.IndividualAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent

    public class IndividualAgent
extends Object
implements Agent
    IndividualAgent class represents an individual (e.g. animal) Individuals have an individual state (Susceptible, Exposed, Infected, etc)
    Author:
    Samantha Lycett
